Title: Website Redesign Project
Description: Complete website redesign including UX/UI improvements, mobile optimization, and CMS integration.

Title: Digital Marketing Campaign
Description: 3-month digital marketing campaign including social media management, PPC advertising, and content creation.

Title: ERP System Implementation
Description: Full ERP system implementation including data migration, training, and 6-month support package.
Terms: 25% upfront, 25% at go-live, 50% at completion. Net 30 payment terms.

Title: Mobile App Development
Description: iOS and Android mobile application development with backend API integration and admin dashboard.
Terms: 40% upfront, 40% at beta release, 20% at completion.

Title: Cloud Migration Services
Description: Migration of on-premises infrastructure to AWS cloud including setup, configuration, and optimization.
Terms: 30% upfront, 40% at migration, 30% at optimization completion.

Title: Cybersecurity Audit
Description: Comprehensive cybersecurity audit including vulnerability assessment and compliance report.

Title: Data Analytics Platform
Description: Custom data analytics platform development with real-time dashboards and reporting capabilities.
Terms: 35% upfront, 35% at milestone, 30% at completion. Net 45 payment terms.

Title: Training Workshop Series
Description: Six-session training workshop series on digital transformation best practices for management team.
Terms: 50% before first session, 50% after completion of series.
